attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The all-new HONDA FIT 1.5 Hybrid E-CVT comes standard with a 4-year/60 000km service plan and a 5-year/200 000km warranty. Roadside assistance of 3 years/200 000km included. The driving experience of this vehicle is sleek and has a generous interior space. All five seats have three-point safety belts and seat-belt reminders. Other safety features include ABS, EBD, an electromechanical parking brake, stability/traction control, 6 x airbags, hill-start assist, cruise control, LED fog lamps, park distance control (front and rear) and a crystal clear display for the rearview camera

Please visit Honda Menlyn to FIND YOUR FIT trade-ins welcome, in-house finance arranged.
